      Generate Minuet (Bach), by adding notes into minuet ArrayList.
      java.lang.String Melody_Generation(java.lang.String s, int firstIndex)
      Generate 12-Tone Matrix and choose Prime/Retrograde/Inversion/Retrograde Inversion Row and combine them into the melody series, combine them into tones of 1-4 pitches and insert pauses according to the Son Clave Rhythm(3122224) to generate the final melodySoundList.

      • setTriVol

                      int b,
                      int c)

        Parameters:

        b - 0 - 11
        c - 0 - 11

      • printPitch

        public java.lang.String printPitch(int[] arr,
                                   java.lang.String s)
        Convert the note values in an integer array to the actual pitch name C C# D D# E F F# G G# A A# B.
        Parameters:
        arr - The integer array that contains note values
        s - The String to store the pitch names
        Returns:
        String to get the convertion result.

      • Melody_Generation

        public java.lang.String Melody_Generation(java.lang.String s,
                                          int firstIndex)
        Generate 12-Tone Matrix and choose Prime/Retrograde/Inversion/Retrograde Inversion Row and combine them into the melody series, combine them into tones of 1-4 pitches and insert pauses according to the Son Clave Rhythm(3122224) to generate the final melodySoundList.
        Parameters:
        s - String for getting logs.
        firstIndex - The shifting steps from the first pitch in the original row to the first pitch C in chromatic order.
        Returns:
        String for getting the logs and pass it to Home_User class.

      • generateMinuet

        public void generateMinuet()
        Generate Minuet (Bach), by adding notes into minuet ArrayList.

        Construct minuet duration list

      • Duration_Row

        public java.lang.String Duration_Row(java.lang.String s)
        Construct the minuetDurationRow ArrayList by adding pauses to minuet according to durations in "minuetDurations".
        Parameters:
        s - to get the log.
        Returns:
        String to pass the log to Home_User class.
